content.rendered:
[vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”6″ bottom_padding=”4″ back_color=”color-199767″ back_image=”5013″ overlay_color=”color-199767″ overlay_alpha=”48″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_empty_space empty_h=”1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”h1″ text_font=”font-384419″ text_color=”color-xsdn” sub_lead=”yes”]Building your career at Audible Magic[/vc_custom_heading][vc_button button_color=”color-189483″ radius=”btn-circle” outline=”yes” border_width=”0″ link=”url:%23jobs|||”]See all open positions[/vc_button][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ back_color=”color-144234″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ el_class=”career-boxes”][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ override_padding=”yes” column_padding=”0″ gutter_size=”3″ back_color=”color-xsdn” overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ shadow=”sm” radius=”std” width=”1/2″][vc_icon position=”left” title_aligned_icon=”yes” display=”inline” icon_image=”4569″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_size=”h5″ text_font=”font-555555″ text_space=”fontspace-273532″ title=”Potential.”][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]After 20 years in business, obtaining more than 65 patents and winning an Emmy, one might think it would be time to wind down. Not for us. We are still the industry standard and continue to shake things up in the marketplace.

We see the potential in the market and our people. And we see the potential in you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ override_padding=”yes” column_padding=”0″ gutter_size=”3″ back_color=”color-xsdn” overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ shadow=”sm” radius=”std” width=”1/2″][vc_icon position=”left” title_aligned_icon=”yes” display=”inline” icon_image=”4569″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_size=”h5″ title=”Growth.”][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]Like our quickly growing company, we want our employees to grow professionally. If you want an environment where you can get up close to a business and expand your existing role, we need to chat.

Growth is challenging and yes, we work hard at Audible Magic, but we also believe work-life balance supports our mission. Plan on seeing your kids, dog or whatever keeps you coming in ready to charge ahead.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ el_class=”career-boxes”][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ override_padding=”yes” column_padding=”0″ gutter_size=”3″ back_color=”color-xsdn” overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ shadow=”sm” radius=”std” width=”1/2″][vc_icon position=”left” title_aligned_icon=”yes” display=”inline” icon_image=”4569″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_size=”h5″ title=”Impact.”][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]We plan to make a big impact on the music and entertainment industry worldwide and are looking for people who thrive on getting results. Whether it is moving into new markets or pushing the limits of technology, you will see the difference you make.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ override_padding=”yes” column_padding=”0″ gutter_size=”3″ back_color=”color-xsdn” overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ shadow=”sm” radius=”std” width=”1/2″][vc_icon position=”left” title_aligned_icon=”yes” display=”inline” icon_image=”4569″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_size=”h5″ title=”Join us.”][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]So, pick your role and contact us.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”jobs”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ align_horizontal=”align_center” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h3″ text_size=”h3″ text_font=”font-384419″ text_color=”color-153010″]Current job openings with Audible Magic[/vc_custom_heading][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
